title: Apartment for urgent sale in Havelock town
details:
This apartment is located in a serene location surrounded by beautiful, eye catching lush of greenery surroundings and the property comprises of all amenities which are required for a luxury lifestyle. Highly residential gated community with 24 hour security, 7 acre garden including a walking path, a gymnasium, club house and a swimming pool. Contact agent to arrange inspection!

URGENT SALE!
Genuine buyers only
